alert.note: Alert for Kittitas Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued November 10 at 5:15AM PST until November 10 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter of a mile or less at times in freezing fog. * WHERE...Kittitas Valley. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential frost on bridges. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing fog will cause slick roadways and sidewalks. There may be very light snow at times this morning falling out from the fog layer.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridges causing slippery roads.
